page.title: 03Lydlinch Village 2
page.content: Just west of the bridges on the left is the hub of ths village,the{garage {and post office-cum-stores.}The garage is renowned for selling the lowest priced petrol in the area and is open from 7a.m.(8a.m. on Sundays) until 10p.m. seven days a week. The shop is the only one for several miles in either direction and is therefore very busy.It is also a social meeting place where all the latest news is discussed and gossip exchanged. Nearly opposite the shop is the local pub,{"The Three Boars".}This is a 'free house' so called because it owes no alliegance to any of the breweries.
